events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role and logged it into our recruitment system for further processing.
After review, the application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate has relevant software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's process and coordinate the next steps.
Initial screening call was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong technical skills and cultural fit.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback expressing keen interest to proceed to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-07 to evaluate advanced engineering skills.
